metadata.name: New Era
metadata.description:
Each person in this picture sees something different. When I interviewed people and asked a question about what is shown in the picture, the answers were completely different. Someone saw the silhouettes of angels, someone said that these are the sands of time, and someone called the painting Repentance. What do you see in this picture?

New Era 2021. Mixed media. Linear style.
Resolution: 2172Ñ…2835 px
